feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: I am a postdoctoral research fellow at Boston Chilnden's Hospital, in the Dupont's lab. My research interest is designing continuum robots for navigation deep in the anatomy, with the aim of diagnosis and treating cancerous tissue or faulty organs.

entry.title: Presentation on Collaborative Magnetic Actuation at ICRA 2023

link.title: Presentation on Collaborative Magnetic Actuation at ICRA 2023

entry.content:
I presented our work on collaborative magnetic actuation using two robotically-actuated permanent magnets at ICRA 2023, in London. Following, the video of my presentation, where I discuss the advantages and need for generateing high intensity and dexterity magnetic fields to actuate magnetic continuum robots. The full paper can be found on IEEE Xplore .

#A simple, elegant caption looks good between video rows, after each row, or doesn't have to be there at all.
entry.summary: this is what included videos could look like
